data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kasungu, Malawi so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kasungu, Malawi

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 9,985 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Kasungu, Malawi.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kasungu, Malawi.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kachchi people. Make the Kachchi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Kasungu, Malawi that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Kasungu, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kasungu, Malawi has a population of 58,700.

We estimate Kasungu has 9,985 people who might know Jesus, 34,441 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 14,274 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Kasungu, Malawi.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.
